Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's truly worth more than what it costs us. Considering its value to you, I propose to sell it to you for $140. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also allows us to maintain a sustainable business model. I'm confident you'll find the investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or if this offer suits your budget. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
